txt.en: Somewhere in the Roaring Hills roams a large and dangerous bear.\n\nYou should find and defeat the great bear Strangbera.
The dangerous bear that once roamed the Roaring Hills is no more.
Somewhere in the Roaring Hills roams a large and dangerous bear.\n\nYou should find and defeat the great bear Strangbera.
The hunters of Woodhurst will now hunt these lands without fear of a predator such as Strangbera stalking the lands.
The rolling hills and fertile ground of the Stonedeans supports lush vegetation which enables predators to grow quite large. There are signs of a very large predator somewhere in the area.

The bears have grown less aggressive from over-gorging on the lush vegetation in the area. There are signs of a more aggressive predator roaming among them, probably the largest bear in the den. Any adventurer or hunter would be proud to defeat such a beast. \n\nThe beast will be formidable, and may be difficult to defeat alone.
